name: wormgrubber
description:
A loser vampire girl who would end the world over a pointless crush.

This is a short visual novel made for  the June/July 2022 VNCUP https://visualnovel.neocities.org/

It's about an hour in length.

There are no explicit visuals, but it has mature themes and some intense scenes.

Content warnings (SPOILERS) cult-themed horror, manipulative relationship, implied suicide.

made with https://www.renpy.org/

soundtrack provided by https://jade-archives.bandcamp.com/ https://twitter.com/jadeinternet
